reference.shortdesc: The bibliolist element references a topic that contains a list of bibliographic entries for the publication.

section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: When the href attribute is not specified, a processor might generate a list of bibliographic entries at the specified location in the map.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The bibliolist element is specialized from topicref. It is defined in the bookmap module.
